question:
What proportion of single bonds are carcinogenic? Please provide your answer as a percentage with five decimal places.
single bond refers to bond_type = '-'; label = '+' mean molecules are carcinogenic; proportion = DIVIDE(SUM(label = '+') * 100, COUNT(bond_id)) where bond_type = '-'
query: SELECT ROUND(CAST((CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.label = '+' THEN T1.bond_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(T1.bond_id), 0)) AS NUMERIC), 5) AS percentage FROM bond AS T1 INNER JOIN molecule AS T2 ON T1.molecule_id = T2.molecule_id WHERE T1.bond_type = '-'
